text: Kenneth J. Rothman (October 11, 1935 â€“ April 26, 2019) was an American lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He served as the 41st Lieutenant Governor of Missouri from 1981 to 1985. He was a member of the Missouri House of Representatives from 1963 to 1981. He also served as the Speaker of the Missouri House of Representatives from 1977 to 1981. He was born in St. Louis, Missouri to Jewish family. Rothman died on April 26, 2019 in St. Louis, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Lawyers from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Politicians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Ken Rothman
